attributes.action: Lets sort our house out first and then become GREAT Britain again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask every millionaire who has over £50 million to donate £1 million to an organization to be constructed by (None political or high office holder of the churches) normal working class people and members of large organizations i.e. Virgin, BAA, etc: consisting of around a 20-30 members plus local committees to sort out the poor and needy of this country, then start helping others around the world.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
